comment.text: This translation key is used to display an error message when a user attempts to access or submit information due to an incorrect password. It appears in various UI elements such as dialogs and panels where password validation is performed, indicating that the provided password is invalid.

usage.context:
<FieldContainer
 className="form-field password-field"
 isVertical={true}
 labelVisible={false}
 hasError={isPasswordErrorShow && !passwordValid}
 errorMessage={t("Common:IncorrectPassword")}
 >
 <PasswordInput
 className="confirm-input"
 simpleView={false}
 passwordSettings={passwordSettings}

</Text>
 <FieldContainer
 isVertical={true}
 labelVisible={false}
 hasError={isPasswordErrorShow && !passwordValid}
 errorMessage={t("Common:IncorrectPassword")}
 >
 <PasswordInput
 simpleView={false}
 passwordSettings={passwordSettings}
 id="password"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Password errata' is understandable, it's not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Incorrect password' in Italian. 'Errata' generally refers to corrections in a printed text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Password errata' -> 'Password non corretta' or 'Password sbagliata'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation "無効のパスワード" (mukyou no pasuwaado) translates to 'invalid password' rather than 'incorrect password'. While close in meaning, 'incorrect' is more direct and accurate in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: パスワードが正しくありません (pasuwaado ga seishiku arimasen)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ລະຫັດລັບບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ" is a possible translation, "ລະຫັດລັບ" primarily translates to "secret code" rather than simply "password." A more direct translation of "Incorrect password" would be something like "ລະຫັດຜ່ານບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ" or "ບ密码ຜ່ານບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລະຫັດຜ່ານບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ
